title: The Heiser Group
markdown:
# The Heiser Group

Seeing Is Believing

## You Won't Believe The Difference

We know you’re busy, and the last thing you need is to come home to a dirty house. That’s why we’re offering **high-quality**, **thorough,** and **hassle-free home cleaning services** in Lake County Illinois including North Shore, Buffalo Grove, North Chicago, Libertyville, Waukegan, Lake Forest and Kenosha WI. We do everything with simple flat-rate pricing and easy online booking.  
‍  
The Heiser Group is one of the the highest-rated home cleaning and maid service in Chicago area. Our core principles of honesty, integrity, with great service and thorough quality means you’ll love the results every time.  
‍  
All you have to do it provide us with an idea of how many rooms there are in your property, then sit back and relax. We'll handle the heavy lifting so that your home is sparkling clean. It's really simple, isn't it?  
We also provide all our own products and cleaning supplies. Give us a shot and book today. You have nothing to lose!

[Get started](https://www.heisergroup.com/contact)
